speech: You're not alone. We want to [help](http://chat.suicidepreventionlifeline.org/GetHelp/LifelineChat.aspx)
You're not alone we want to help' please call 1-800-273-8255, or click [help](http://chat.suicidepreventionlifeline.org/GetHelp/LifelineChat.aspx) for more help.
